meanings.definition: Coming after the twelfth in a series.
meanings.sent1: The thirteenth cupcake was decorated with colorful sprinkles.
meanings.sent2: She celebrated her thirteenth birthday with a fun party.
meanings.sent3: The thirteenth cookie in the jar magically disappeared!
meanings.sent4: The thirteenth hour of waiting felt like an eternity.
meanings.sent5: The thirteenth flower in the garden bloomed beautifully.

meanings.sent1: He ate the thirteenth slice of pizza at the party.
meanings.sent2: The thirteenth of the month is considered unlucky by some.
meanings.sent3: The thirteenth cookie in the jar was the lucky one!
meanings.sent4: She was the thirteenth member to join the club.
meanings.sent5: The thirteenth piece of the puzzle finally fit perfectly.
